actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (1d10 + 4 damage) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6 damage) fire damage.

actions.name: Fire Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 24 (7d6 damage) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
